# Mosquito Alert+ Project Instructions

This is a full-stack MERN application for mosquito breeding site reporting with AI validation.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React, Tailwind CSS, React Router, Axios, Recharts
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose
- Auth: JWT, bcrypt
- File Upload: Multer

## Project Status
✅ Complete! All code generated and ready to use.

## Features Implemented
✅ User authentication (signup/login)
✅ Admin authentication (pre-seeded, no signup)
✅ Facebook-style image feed
✅ Drag-drop image upload with preview
✅ AI validation with duplicate detection
✅ Rule-based scoring system
✅ User dashboard with points tracking
✅ Admin dashboard with Recharts analytics
✅ Leaderboard system
✅ Risk prediction and alerts
✅ Report status management
✅ Area-wise risk assessment

## Next Steps
1. Install Node.js (if not already installed)
2. Install MongoDB or setup MongoDB Atlas
3. Run: cd server && npm install
4. Run: cd client && npm install
5. Seed admin: cd server && npm run seed
6. Start backend: npm run dev
7. Start frontend: npm start

See SETUP_GUIDE.md for detailed instructions!
